definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: : Is 24:8 id.;—abs. ´[[מ]]: Is 32:13 +, cstr. [[מְשׂוֹשׂ]] Job 8:19 +; sf. [[מְשׂוֹשִׂי]] Je 49:25, [[מְשׂוֹשָׂתּ]] Ho 2:13;—exultation, in gen., La 5:15 (opp. [[אֵבֶל]]), Is 24:11, Is 66:10 (acc. cogn.); of bridegroom Is 62:5; [[תֻּפִּיס]] ´[[מ]]:, Is 24:8, [[בִנּוֹר]] ´[[מ]]: v:Is 24:8; ´[[בָּתֵּי מ]]: Is 33:13; of Jerus.(as causing joy) Is 60:15, Ps 48:3, La 2:15, cf. Je 49:25 ([[קִרְיַת מְשׂוֹשִׂי]]; ‖[[תְּהִלָּה ]]), Is 65:18 (‖[[גִּילָה ]]); [[דַּרְבּוֹ]] ´[[מ]]: (of godless man) Job 8:19; [[פְּרָאִים]] ´[[מ]]: Is 32:14, i.e. desert.—´[[מ]]: Is 8:6, si vera l., is cstr. before prep., but ([[מִפְּנֵי]]) [[מָסוֹס]], Hi Gie Che Du Kit Marti al.
